summary: Toncoin is independent from Telegram, though does have the messaging service's endorsement.
title: Huobi, Kucoin, Others Lead $250M Toncoin Ecosystem Fund
content: The venture arms of cryptocurrency exchanges Huobi and Kucoin are among the backers of a new $250 million ecosystem fund to support projects built on Toncoin, the reincarnation of failed blockchain project TON.
Read more: KuCoin Community Chain Launches $50M Accelerator to Nurture Ecosystem Projects
CORRECT (April 12, 14:46 UTC): Corrects TON's full name in second bullet point. An earlier version called it Telegram Open Network.
